review: I ordered this because my main media device was a playstation 3. I loved using that but I wanted to go to something with a smaller footprint. When I saw this on Amazon for $20, I couldn't say no. I mainly use prime, netflix and hulu plus for movies and TV so this fit the bill. It has been great so far. My reason for dropping a star is the wireless. I have tried everything under the sun. I will preface by saying I am a network tech, so while I don't know everything, I do know that the issue is with the device. I tried different APs(first one was cisco, second was the wireless built into my belkin), different wireless channels, different IP schemes(static and dynamic), tried changing network security types and even used simple qos to make sure that it was getting enough bandwidth. I checked my firewall and even shut it off on my router to test if that was causing issues. No matter what I do, the device will randomly disconnect from my network. If I go to reconnect it will see my wireless but not connect. No other devices have this problem on my network except for this. Unless I missed something, the only thing left is the devices software or firmware. I wish amazon would look into this as it seems many other people have this same issue. It is a huge inconvenience due to having to reboot the device in order for it to connect again. Besides this, it's great. Hopefully amazon fixes this networking issue because it is the only thing that keeps me from loving this thing 100%.
